titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Publications on the Brooklyn Navy Yard 1992.006
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:14:05 +0000.

did.unittitle: Publications on the Brooklyn Navy Yard
did.abstract: This collection consists of publications concerning the Brooklyn Navy Yard touching on housing, history, relics found at the site, and a chronology of land acquisition with purchase amounts.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Publications on the Brooklyn Navy Yard, 1992.006, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of publications concerning the Brooklyn Navy Yard touching on housing, history, relics found at the site, and a chronology of land acquisition with purchase amounts.
